headline.main: VICHY REPORTED DEFYING BERLIN; Public Indignation and Threat by Marshal to Quit Said to Have Checked Pressure VICHY REPORTED DEFYING BERLIN

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Aug. 2 -- Another "collaboration crisis" involving the "request" for a change in the Ministries of War and Interior in the Vichy Cabinet, as well as the right to "protect" the French North and West African naval and air bases from the "imperialistic designs of 'foreign powers,'" appears to be developing in Vichy tonight.
abstract: Petain reptd to have refused use of Dakar and North Africa to any but French armed forces

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
